intro: Euphrasia × haussknechtii, commonly known as the hybrid eyebright, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to Europe. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, clustered flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant typically grows to a height of 10–30 cm and features hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves. It thrives in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Euphrasia × haussknechtii is often cultivated for its ornamental value and has been used in traditional herbal medicine.
